name: key
description: an old rusted key, feels a little slimy...

name: skeleton-key
description: The base of this keep seems to be engraved with a skull...

name: book
description: A book with torn pages and scribblings of a rambling madman.

description: It's said it can deflect bullets, but that seems a bit far fetched.

name: flashlight
description: It flickers.....maybe if you shake the batteries it'll work.
